de.dezibel.data

Class Comment

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.dezibel.data.Comment

  • public class Comment
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents the comments users can post to Media, Albums etc.
    Author:
    Henner
    Invariant:
    self.text != null && !self.text.equals("") && self.creationDate != null && self.commentable != null && self.authoer != null

    • Constructor Detail

      • Comment

        public Comment(java.lang.String text,
       Commentable commentable,
       User author)
        Creates a new comment consisting of text written by author and posted to commentable.
        Parameters:
        text - The text of the comment. Must not be null or the empty String after being trimmed.
        commentable - The commentable object this comment is being posted to.
        author - The user who wrote the comment.

    • Method Detail

        This method completely deletes the comment from the database and clears all its associations.
